00041  SUBROUTINE MemAlloc(FLAG)
00042 
00043 ! Common Variables
00044  USE Domain
00045  USE FluidParams, ONLY : gradPhiX_f, gradPhiY_f, lapPhi_f, p, p_f, phi_f, u, u_f
00046  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : f, fcol, fdim, g, gdim
00047  USE MPIParams
00048  IMPLICIT NONE
00049 
00050 ! Input/Output Parameters
00051  INTEGER, INTENT (IN) :: FLAG
00052 
00053 !-------- Allocate memory for all the MPI data exchanges -----------------------
00054  IF(FLAG == 1) THEN
00055 
00056 ! Memory allocation - Momentum/Pressure Mesh
00057    ALLOCATE(  p(xlg:xug,ylg:yug) )
00058    ALLOCATE(  u(xlg:xug,ylg:yug,2) )
00059    ALLOCATE(  g(xlg:xug,ylg:yug,0:gdim,0:1) )
00060    ALLOCATE( ni(xlg:xug,ylg:yug,1:4) )
00061 
00062 ! Memory Allocation - Order Parameter Mesh
00063    ALLOCATE(   p_f(xlg_f:xug_f,ylg_f:yug_f) )
00064    ALLOCATE(   u_f(xlg_f:xug_f,ylg_f:yug_f,2) )
00065    ALLOCATE( phi_f(xlg_f:xug_f,ylg_f:yug_f) )
00066    ALLOCATE(     f(xlg_f:xug_f,ylg_f:yug_f,0:fdim) )
00067    ALLOCATE(  fcol(xlg_f:xug_f,ylg_f:yug_f,0:fdim) )
00068    ALLOCATE(  ni_f(xlg_f:xug_f,ylg_f:yug_f,1:4) )
00069    ALLOCATE( gradPhiX_f(xlg_f:xug_f,ylg_f:yug_f) )
00070    ALLOCATE( gradPhiY_f(xlg_f:xug_f,ylg_f:yug_f) )
00071    ALLOCATE(   lapPhi_f(xlg_f:xug_f,ylg_f:yug_f) )
00072 
00073 ! Allocation for the exchanged data in the x direction
00074    xsize_f = yu_f - yl_f + 1
00075    xsize   = yu - yl + 1
00076    xsize6  = xsize*6
00077 
00078    ALLOCATE( phi_west_snd(1:xsize_f) )
00079    ALLOCATE( phi_east_snd(1:xsize_f) )
00080    ALLOCATE( phi_west_rcv(1:xsize_f) )
00081    ALLOCATE( phi_east_rcv(1:xsize_f) )
00082 
00083    ALLOCATE( f_west_snd(1:xsize_f) )
00084    ALLOCATE( f_east_snd(1:xsize_f) )
00085    ALLOCATE( f_west_rcv(1:xsize_f) )
00086    ALLOCATE( f_east_rcv(1:xsize_f) )
00087 
00088    ALLOCATE( hydro_west_snd(1:xsize6) )
00089    ALLOCATE( hydro_east_snd(1:xsize6) )
00090    ALLOCATE( hydro_west_rcv(1:xsize6) )
00091    ALLOCATE( hydro_east_rcv(1:xsize6) )
00092 
00093 ! Allocation for the exchanged data in the y direction
00094    ysize_f = xu_f - xl_f + 1
00095    ysize   = xu - xl + 1
00096    ysize6  = ysize*6
00097 
00098    ALLOCATE( phi_south_snd(1:ysize_f) )
00099    ALLOCATE( phi_north_snd(1:ysize_f) )
00100    ALLOCATE( phi_south_rcv(1:ysize_f) )
00101    ALLOCATE( phi_north_rcv(1:ysize_f) )
00102 
00103    ALLOCATE( f_south_snd(1:ysize_f) )
00104    ALLOCATE( f_north_snd(1:ysize_f) )
00105    ALLOCATE( f_south_rcv(1:ysize_f) )
00106    ALLOCATE( f_north_rcv(1:ysize_f) )
00107 
00108    ALLOCATE( hydro_south_snd(1:ysize6) )
00109    ALLOCATE( hydro_north_snd(1:ysize6) )
00110    ALLOCATE( hydro_south_rcv(1:ysize6) )
00111    ALLOCATE( hydro_north_rcv(1:ysize6) )
00112 
00113 !-------- Deallocate memory corresponding to MPI data exchanges ----------------
00114  ELSE
00115    DEALLOCATE( f )
00116    DEALLOCATE( fcol )
00117    DEALLOCATE( g )
00118    DEALLOCATE( ni )
00119    DEALLOCATE( p )
00120    DEALLOCATE( u )
00121    DEALLOCATE( ni_f )
00122    DEALLOCATE( phi_f )
00123    DEALLOCATE( p_f )
00124    DEALLOCATE( u_f )
00125    DEALLOCATE( gradPhiX_f )
00126    DEALLOCATE( gradPhiY_f )
00127    DEALLOCATE( lapPhi_f )
00128    DEALLOCATE( f_west_snd )
00129    DEALLOCATE( f_west_rcv )
00130    DEALLOCATE( f_east_snd )
00131    DEALLOCATE( f_east_rcv )
00132    DEALLOCATE( phi_west_snd )
00133    DEALLOCATE( phi_west_rcv )
00134    DEALLOCATE( phi_east_snd )
00135    DEALLOCATE( phi_east_rcv )
00136    DEALLOCATE( hydro_west_snd )
00137    DEALLOCATE( hydro_east_snd )
00138    DEALLOCATE( hydro_west_rcv )
00139    DEALLOCATE( hydro_east_rcv )
00140    DEALLOCATE( f_south_snd )
00141    DEALLOCATE( f_south_rcv )
00142    DEALLOCATE( f_north_snd )
00143    DEALLOCATE( f_north_rcv )
00144    DEALLOCATE( phi_south_snd )
00145    DEALLOCATE( phi_south_rcv )
00146    DEALLOCATE( phi_north_snd )
00147    DEALLOCATE( phi_north_rcv )
00148    DEALLOCATE( hydro_south_snd )
00149    DEALLOCATE( hydro_south_rcv )
00150    DEALLOCATE( hydro_north_snd )
00151    DEALLOCATE( hydro_north_rcv )
00152  END IF
00153 
00154  RETURN
00155  END SUBROUTINE MemAlloc
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:06:41 2008 for ZSC-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
